name: Valentine Collection 2023
description:
A short kinetic novel from various Altila's visual novel characters. 

It's Valentine's day, so they are performing Valentine's day skits with you!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES

  • Short Valentine's day skit.
  • 7 characters. You can either give chocolate to them or receive chocolate from them. 
  • 7 unlockable CGs.
  • CG Gallery.

(Note: Although there are scenarios for both giving and receiving, the girls' CG will be on the "receive" (you receive chocolate from them) scenario and the boys' CG will be on the "give" (you give chocolate to them) scenario.  Also, the CG-less scenario will be shorter than the one with CG).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CHARACTERS

  • Joan (The Witch's Name)
    A hard-working but slightly broke villager who knows about valentine's day but never celebrate it before. She doesn't even know the taste of chocolate.
  • Witch (The Witch's Name)
    An introverted witch who wants to live in peace even on valentine's day. Not everyone knows that she is a witch.
  • Scarlet (Eternal Flower)
    A daughter of a rich businessman. Rarely leaves the house but is very excited about valentine's day. 
  • Mary (Eternal Flower)
    A very skillful maid who works for a rich businessman's house. Rather cold and not good at expressing herself, but will do her best for her partner.
  • Demon (The Witch's Name)
    A cat demon who lives in the forest but likes to (secretly and discreetly) visit the nearby village. Just happened to hear about this thing called Valentine's day.
  • Chronos (Eternal Flower)
    A head researcher of magic technology. Usually holed up in his laboratory. He is a busy man even on Valentine's day but will find time for his precious person.
  • Carmine (Eternal Flower)
    A florist whose store is very busy during Valentine's day. He loves to give presents to the one he adores. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
